action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a series of colored blocks arranged in a pattern. The blocks are in shades of green, purple, and pink. The arrangement includes a cross shape made of purple and green blocks, a vertical line of green blocks, and a pink block with a smaller purple block on top. There is also an orange block with a smaller green block on top.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a series of colored blocks arranged in a specific pattern. The blocks are in the colors red, purple, yellow, and orange. The arrangement includes a red "U" shape at the top, a purple "U" shape below it, a yellow "T" shape in the middle, and a red "T" shape at the bottom. The purple "U" shape at the bottom is connected to the red "T" shape.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a series of colored blocks arranged in a pattern. The blocks are in shades of green, purple, and pink. The arrangement includes a cross shape made of purple and green blocks, a vertical line of green blocks, and a pink block with a smaller purple block on top. There is also an orange block with a smaller green block on top.

QUESTION: What is the color of the block that is placed on top of the orange block in your image?
